chapitre.paragraphe: Excellence must be pursued, it must be wooed
with all of one’s might and every bit of effort
that we have each day there’s a new encounter,
each week is a new challenge. All of the noise
and all of the glamour all of the color
all of the excitement all of the rings and all of the money.
These are the things that linger only in the memory.
But the spirit, the will to excel, the will to win,
these are the things that endure.
